name: Gaomon
description: Gaomon is a bipedal blue Akita dog with black nose and claws, yellow eyes, a white belly, white neck fur, a white tail tip, feet tips, snout, inner ears, and a linear mark on their forehead that is depicted as either white or yellow.  they wear a red bandana, with white bandages on their arms, and red, black, and white boxing gloves on their hands.
